Gunsight news about USSR AA and JP sights
炮瞄新闻——关于苏联防空与日本的战车瞄具
25.08.11 update
USSR AA universal sight

The left pic is a new Russian AA sight for NSV HMG after 2020, it can be equipped USSR and CN AA vehicles.
左图是2020年后被发现的俄国NSV重机枪防空反射式瞄准镜，可用于苏中防空载具。

JP 47mm universal sight

The middle pic is a actual photo of the Japanese 47mm gunsight, I find it in a Chinese webside. It may be a early version, or equipped the Infantry AT guns, or it is the only right version of Japanese 47mm gun sight.
中图是日本47毫米炮镜的实物照片，我在bilibili上截图的，这可能是早期型号，或者装备的是反坦克炮，亦或这是日本4...

How to Download
1:Extract the file first.
2:Move "obitoo" to UserSights folder and paste into all_tanks and
WarThunder > UserSights > all_tanks
3:open the game and use
